df-rrh
blocks.content: Define the canonical homomorphism from the real numbers to any complete field, as the extension by continuity of the canonical homomorphism from the rational numbers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Oct-2017.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Oct-2017.)

blocks.name: rrhval
blocks.content: Value of the canonical homormorphism from the real numbers to a complete space. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm rrhval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(crrh, c0), cfv(co(c2, ccnext, c3), cfv(cqqh, c0))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ctopn, c0))
} = {
  syl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(crrh, c0), cfv(co(c2, ccnext, c3), cfv(cqqh, c0))), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, crrh, cfv(co(c2, ccnext, c3), cfv(cqqh, c0)), cfv(co(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), ccnext, cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0))), cfv(cqqh, cv(hs0))))
  fveq12d(co(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), ccnext, cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0))), cfv(cqqh, cv(hs0)), co(c2, ccnext, c3), cfv(cqqh, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq12d(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), ccnext, cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), c2, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  a1i(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), c2))
  eqcomi(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), c2)
  syl6eqr(cfv(ctopn, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(ctopn, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, ctopn)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cqqh)
  df-rrh(hs0)
  fvex(co(c2, ccnext, c3), cfv(cqqh, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(co(c2, ccnext, c3), cfv(cqqh, c0)))
}

} = {

  fvmpt(hs0, c0, universe, crrh, ((c2[CnExt]c3)`(QQHom ` c0)), (((topGen ` ran((,)))[CnExt](TopOpen ` hs0))`(QQHom ` hs0)))
  fveq12d(((topGen ` ran((,)))[CnExt](TopOpen ` hs0)), (QQHom ` hs0), (c2[CnExt]c3), (QQHom ` c0), hs0 = c0)

blocks.name: rrhcn
blocks.content: If the topology of ` R ` is Hausdorff, and ` R ` is a complete uniform space, then the canonical homomorphism from the real numbers to ` R ` is continuous. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Jan-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm rrhcn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(crrh, c0), co(c1, ccn, c2)))
  -| wceq(c3, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c4, c4)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(czlm, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cnrg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cnlm))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccusp))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cuss, c0), cfv(cmetu, c3)))
} = {
  eqeltrd(cfv(crrh, c0), co(c1, ccn, c2), cfv(co(c1, ccnext, c2), cfv(cqqh, c0)), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(crrh, c0), cfv(co(c1, ccnext, c2), cfv(cqqh, c0))), wcel(c0, ctps))
  rrhval(c0, ctps, c1, c2)
  ucnextcn(c1, c2, cfv(cqqh, c0), cr, crefld, c4, c0, cfv(cuss, crefld), cfv(cuss, co(ccnfld, cress, cq)), cq, cfv(cuss, c0), w0)
  rebase()
  eqtri(c1, cfv(ctopn, crefld), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  retopn()
  eqid(cfv(cuss, crefld))
  fveq2i(cuss, co(ccnfld, cress, cq), co(crefld, cress, cq))
  eqtr2i(co(ccnfld, cress, cq), co(crefld, cress, cq), co(co(ccnfld, cress, cr), cress, cq))
  oveq1i(crefld, cress, cq, co(ccnfld, cress, cr))
  df-refld()
  mp2an(wceq(co(co(ccnfld, cress, cr), cress, cq), co(ccnfld, cress, cq)), wcel(cr, universe), wss(cq, cr))
  reex()
  ressabs(cr, universe, cq, ccnfld)
  eqid(cfv(cuss, c0))
  a1i(w0, wcel(crefld, ctps))
  mp2b(wcel(crefld, ctps), wcel(crefld, ccms), wcel(crefld, cms))
  recms()
  cmsms(crefld)
  mstps(crefld)
  mp1i(w0, wcel(crefld, cusp), wcel(crefld, ccusp))
  recusp()
  cuspusp(crefld)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c0, cxms))
  xmstps(c0)
  eqeltrd(c2, cha, cfv(cmopn, c3), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cmopn, c3)), wcel(c0, cxms))
  xmstopn(c0, c2, c3, c4)
  3syl(w0, wcel(cfv(cmopn, c3), cha), wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c3, cfv(cxmet, c4)))
  3syl(w0, wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c0, cngp))
  nrgngp(c0)
  ngpxms(c0)
  xmsxmet(c0, c3, c4)
  methaus(c3, c4, cfv(cmopn, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cmopn, c3))
  a1i(w0, wss(cq, cr))
  qssre()
  eleqtrd(cfv(cqqh, c0), co(cfv(cuss, co(ccnfld, cress, cq)), cucn, cfv(cuss, c0)), co(cfv(cuss, co(ccnfld, cress, cq)), cucn, cfv(cmetu, c3)), w0)
  qqhucn(c0, cfv(cuss, co(ccnfld, cress, cq)), cfv(cmetu, c3), c4, co(ccnfld, cress, cq), c5, w0)
  eqid(co(ccnfld, cress, cq))
  eqid(cfv(cuss, co(ccnfld, cress, cq)))
  fveq2i(cmetu, c3, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c4, c4)))
  oveq2d(cfv(cuss, co(ccnfld, cress, cq)), cucn, cfv(cmetu, c3), cfv(cuss, c0), w0)
  eqcomd(cfv(cmetu, c3), cfv(cuss, c0), w0)
  a1i(w0, wceq(cfv(cfv(ccl, c1), cq), cr))
  eqtri(cfv(cfv(ccl, c1), cq), cr, cfv(cfv(ccl, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))), cq))
  fveq1i(cfv(ccl, c1), cq, cfv(ccl, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))))
  fveq2i(ccl, c1, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  qdensere()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rrhcn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(RRHom ` c0)‚àà(c1[Cn]c2))
  ‚ä£ c3 =((dist ` c0)|`(c4 √ó c4))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(topGen ` ran((,)))
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(TopOpen ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(ZMod ` c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà DivRing)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà NrmRing)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà NrmMod)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(chr ` c0)= 0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà CUnifSp)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(UnifSt ` c0)=(metUnif ` c3))
} = {
  eqeltrd((RRHom ` c0), (c1[Cn]c2), ((c1[CnExt]c2)`(QQHom ` c0)), w0)
  syl(w0, (RRHom ` c0)=((c1[CnExt]c2)`(QQHom ` c0)), c0 ‚àà TopSp)
  rrhval(c0, ctps, c1, c2)
  ucnextcn(c1, c2, (QQHom ` c0), cr, crefld, c4, c0, (UnifSt ` RRfld), (UnifSt `(CCfld[|`s]‚Ñö)), cq, (UnifSt ` c0), w0)
  rebase()
  eqtri(c1, (TopOpen ` RRfld), (topGen ` ran((,))))
  retopn()
  eqid((UnifSt ` RRfld))
  fveq2i(cuss, (CCfld[|`s]‚Ñö), (RRfld[|`s]‚Ñö))
  eqtr2i((CCfld[|`s]‚Ñö), (RRfld[|`s]‚Ñö), ((CCfld[|`s]‚Ñù)[|`s]‚Ñö))
  oveq1i(crefld, cress, cq, (CCfld[|`s]‚Ñù))
  df-refld()
  mp2an(((CCfld[|`s]‚Ñù)[|`s]‚Ñö)=(CCfld[|`s]‚Ñö), ‚Ñù ‚àà ùïå, ‚Ñö ‚äÜ ‚Ñù)
  reex()
  ressabs(cr, universe, cq, ccnfld)
  eqid((UnifSt ` c0))
  a1i(w0, RRfld ‚àà TopSp)
  mp2b(RRfld ‚àà TopSp, RRfld ‚àà CMetSp, RRfld ‚àà MetSp)
  recms()
  cmsms(crefld)
  mstps(crefld)
  mp1i(w0, RRfld ‚àà UnifSp, RRfld ‚àà CUnifSp)
  recusp()
  cuspusp(crefld)
  syl(w0, c0 ‚àà TopSp, c0 ‚àà *MetSp)
  xmstps(c0)
  eqeltrd(c2, cha, (MetOpen ` c3), w0)
  syl(w0, c2 =(MetOpen ` c3), c0 ‚àà *MetSp)
  xmstopn(c0, c2, c3, c4)
  3syl(w0, (MetOpen ` c3)‚àà Haus, c0 ‚àà *MetSp, c3 ‚àà(*Met ` c4))
  3syl(w0, c0 ‚àà *MetSp, c0 ‚àà NrmRing, c0 ‚àà NrmGrp)
  nrgngp(c0)
  ngpxms(c0)
  xmsxmet(c0, c3, c4)
  methaus(c3, c4, (MetOpen ` c3))
  eqid((MetOpen ` c3))
  a1i(w0, ‚Ñö ‚äÜ ‚Ñù)
  qssre()
  eleqtrd((QQHom ` c0), ((UnifSt `(CCfld[|`s]‚Ñö))[uCn](UnifSt ` c0)), ((UnifSt `(CCfld[|`s]‚Ñö))[uCn](metUnif ` c3)), w0)
  qqhucn(c0, (UnifSt `(CCfld[|`s]‚Ñö)), (metUnif ` c3), c4, (CCfld[|`s]‚Ñö), c5, w0)
  eqid((CCfld[|`s]‚Ñö))
  eqid((UnifSt `(CCfld[|`s]‚Ñö)))
  fveq2i(cmetu, c3, ((dist ` c0)|`(c4 √ó c4)))
  oveq2d((UnifSt `(CCfld[|`s]‚Ñö)), cucn, (metUnif ` c3), (UnifSt ` c0), w0)
  eqcomd((metUnif ` c3), (UnifSt ` c0), w0)
  a1i(w0, ((cls ` c1)` ‚Ñö)= ‚Ñù)
  eqtri(((cls ` c1)` ‚Ñö), cr, ((cls `(topGen ` ran((,))))` ‚Ñö))
  fveq1i((cls ` c1), cq, (cls `(topGen ` ran((,)))))
  fveq2i(ccl, c1, (topGen ` ran((,))))
  qdensere()
}

blocks.name: rrhf
blocks.content: If the topology of ` R ` is Hausdorff, Cauchy sequences have at most one limit, i.e. the canonical homomorphism of ` RR ` into ` R ` is a function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm rrhf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf(cfv(crrh, c0), cr, c1))
  -| wceq(c2, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c1, c1)))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ctopn, c0))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(czlm, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cnrg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cnlm))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccusp))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cuss, c0), cfv(cmetu, c2)))
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wf(cfv(crrh, c0), cr, c1)), wceq(c3, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo))))
  mpbird(w0, wf(cfv(crrh, c0), cr, c1), wf(cfv(crrh, c0), cr, cuni(c4)))
  syl(w0, wf(cfv(crrh, c0), cr, cuni(c4)), wcel(cfv(crrh, c0), co(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), ccn, c4)))
  rrhcn(c0, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), c4, c2, c1, c5, w0)
  eqid(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  cnf(cfv(crrh, c0), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), c4, cr, cuni(c4))
  uniretop()
  eqid(cuni(c4))
  feq3d(cfv(crrh, c0), cr, c1, cuni(c4), w0)
  3syl(w0, wceq(c1, cuni(c4)), wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c0, ctps))
  3syl(w0, wcel(c0, cxms), wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c0, cngp))
  nrgngp(c0)
  ngpxms(c0)
  xmstps(c0)
  tpsuni(c0, c1, c4)
}

thm rrhf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((RRHom ` c0): ‚Ñù ‚Üí c1))
  ‚ä£ c2 =((dist ` c0)|`(c1 √ó c1))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(topGen ` ran((,)))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(TopOpen ` c0)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(ZMod ` c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà DivRing)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà NrmRing)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà NrmMod)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(chr ` c0)= 0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà CUnifSp)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(UnifSt ` c0)=(metUnif ` c2))
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí((RRHom ` c0): ‚Ñù ‚Üí c1)), c3 =(topGen ` ran((,))))
  mpbird(w0, ((RRHom ` c0): ‚Ñù ‚Üí c1), ((RRHom ` c0): ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c4))
  syl(w0, ((RRHom ` c0): ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚ãÉ c4), (RRHom ` c0)‚àà((topGen ` ran((,)))[Cn]c4))
  rrhcn(c0, (topGen ` ran((,))), c4, c2, c1, c5, w0)
  eqid((topGen ` ran((,))))
  cnf((RRHom ` c0), (topGen ` ran((,))), c4, cr, ‚ãÉ c4)
  uniretop()
  eqid(‚ãÉ c4)
  feq3d((RRHom ` c0), cr, c1, ‚ãÉ c4, w0)
  3syl(w0, c1 = ‚ãÉ c4, c0 ‚àà *MetSp, c0 ‚àà TopSp)
  3syl(w0, c0 ‚àà *MetSp, c0 ‚àà NrmRing, c0 ‚àà NrmGrp)
  nrgngp(c0)
  ngpxms(c0)
  xmstps(c0)
  tpsuni(c0, c1, c4)

blocks.name: df-rrext
blocks.content: Define the class of extensions of ` RR ` . This is a shorthand for listing the necessary conditions for a structure to admit a canonical embedding of ` RR ` into it. Interestingly, this is not coming from a mathematical reference, but was from the necessary conditions to build the embedding at each step ( ` ZZ ` , ` QQ ` and ` RR ` ). It would be interesting see if this is formally treated in the literature. See ~ isrrext for a better readable version. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-May-2018.)

blocks.name: isrrext
blocks.content: Express the property " ` R ` is an extension of ` RR ` ". (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 2-May-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm isrrext(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, crrext), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c0, cdr)), wa(wcel(c1, cnlm), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), wa(wcel(c0, ccusp), wceq(cfv(cuss, c0), cfv(cmetu, c2)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cres(cfv(cds, c0), cxp(c3, c3)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(czlm, c0))
} = {
  3bitr4i(wcel(c0, crrext), w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c0, cdr)), wa(wcel(c1, cnlm), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), wa(wcel(c0, ccusp), wceq(cfv(cuss, c0), cfv(cmetu, c2)))), wa(wcel(c0, cin(cnrg, cdr)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cnlm), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), wa(wcel(c0, ccusp), wceq(cfv(cuss, c0), cfv(cmetu, c2))))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c0, cdr)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cnlm), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), wa(wcel(c0, ccusp), wceq(cfv(cuss, c0), cfv(cmetu, c2))))))
  anbi1i(wcel(c0, cin(cnrg, cdr)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cnlm), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), wa(wcel(c0, ccusp), wceq(cfv(cuss, c0), cfv(cmetu, c2)))), wa(wcel(c0, cnrg), wcel(c0, cdr)))
  elin(c0, cnrg, cdr)
  elrab2(hs0, c0, crrext, cin(cnrg, cdr), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cnlm), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), wa(wcel(c0, ccusp), wceq(cfv(cuss, c0), cfv(cmetu, c2)))), wa(wa(wcel(cfv(czlm, cv(hs0)), cnlm), wceq(cfv(cchr, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), ccusp), wceq(cfv(cuss, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmetu, cres(cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(cfv(czlm, cv(hs0)), cnlm), wceq(cfv(cchr, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), ccusp), wceq(cfv(cuss, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmetu, cres(cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))))), wa(wcel(c1, cnlm), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0)), wa(wcel(c0, ccusp), wceq(cfv(cuss, c0), cfv(cmetu, c2))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cfv(czlm, cv(hs0)), cnlm), wceq(cfv(cchr, cv(hs0)), nat0), wcel(c1, cnlm), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0))
  syl6bbr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cfv(czlm, cv(hs0)), cnlm), wcel(c1, cnlm), wcel(cfv(czlm, c0), cnlm))
  eleq1d(cfv(czlm, cv(hs0)), cnlm, cfv(czlm, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, czlm)
  eleq1i(c1, cnlm, cfv(czlm, c0))
  fveqeq2(cv(hs0), c0, cchr, nat0)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), ccusp), wceq(cfv(cuss, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmetu, cres(cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c0, ccusp), wceq(cfv(cuss, c0), cfv(cmetu, c2)))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c0, ccusp)
  eqeq12d(cfv(cuss, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmetu, cres(cfv(cds, cv(hs0)), cxp(cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))), cfv(cuss, c0), cfv(cmetu, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cuss)

blocks.name: rrextnrg

blocks.name: rrextdrg

blocks.name: rrextnlm

blocks.name: rrextchr

blocks.name: rrextcusp

blocks.name: rrexttps

  rrhval(c0, crrext, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), cfv(ctopn, c0))
  eqid(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  cnextfres(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), cfv(ctopn, c0), cfv(cqqh, c0), c1, cr, cuni(cfv(ctopn, c0)), cq, wa(wcel(c0, crrext), wcel(c1, cq)))
  uniretop()
  eqid(cuni(cfv(ctopn, c0)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, crrext), wcel(c1, cq)), wcel(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), ctop))

blocks.name: rrh0

thm rrh0(class c0) {

  0z()
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, crrext), wcel(nat0, cq)), wceq(cfv(cfv(crrh, c0), nat0), cfv(cfv(cqqh, c0), nat0)), wcel(c0, crrext), wcel(nat0, cq))
  simpl(wcel(c0, crrext), wcel(nat0, cq))
  simpr(wcel(c0, crrext), wcel(nat0, cq))
  rrhqima(c0, nat0)
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, crrext), wceq(cfv(cfv(cqqh, c0), nat0), cfv(c0g, c0)), wcel(c0, cdr), wceq(cfv(cchr, c0), nat0))

}
